help.commandDescription: See informations about my commands or list them.
help.commandNotFound: I couldn't find a command with that name!
help.title: Commands
help.youCanUse: but you can also use {{- botMention}} as a prefix.

avatar.commandDescription: Sees the avatar from an user.

guildinfo.commandDescription: See some informations about a guild.

userinfo.commandDescription: See some informations about an user.

math.invalidMathExpression: You need to inform a valid math expression!
math.title: Result `{{result}}`

github.commandDescription: Sees the github of an user.
github.missingParameters: You need to inform the name of a Github user.
github.userNotFound: No user with the name '{{user}}' found.
github.noBio: No bio found for this user.

channelinfo.noTopic: This channel doesn't have a topic.

createemoji.commandDescription: Create an emoji in the current guild.
createemoji.noImage: You need to inform a valid image for the emoji.
createemoji.noName: You need to inform a name for the emoji.

deleteemoji.commandDescription: Delete an emoji in the current guild.
deleteemoji.invalidEmoji: You need to inform a valid emoji.

kick.commandDescription: Kicks a member from this server.
kick.missingUser: You have to give me a member to kick!
kick.missingReason: You have to give me a reason for kicking!
kick.noPermission: I'm missing the **$t(permissions:KICK_MEMBERS)** permission to kick this member.

ban.commandDescription: Bans a member from this server.
ban.missingUser: You have to give me a member to ban!
ban.missingReason: You have to give me a reason for banning!
ban.noPermission: I'm missing the **$t(permissions:BAN_MEMBERS)** permission to ban this member.

purge.invalidNumber: You have to give me a number between 1 and 100!

softban.commandDescription: Bans a member, removes all of their messages and then unbans them.
softban.missingUser: You have to give me a member to softban!
softban.missingReason: You have to give me a reason for softbanning!
softban.noPermission: I'm missing the **$t(permissions:BAN_MEMBERS)** permission to softban this member.

unban.missingUser: You must give me a valid user!

poll.commandDescription: Starts an interactive poll in your discord server
poll.noArguments: You need to give me the poll title!

coinflip.commandDescription: Play a head or tails game!

botinfo.hello: Hello {{user}}, my name is Mayfi and i'm a simples bot for Discord with some awesome feactures ^-^
botinfo.statistics: I'm awake for **{{uptime}}**, i'm throwing happiness to **{{guilds}} servers** and talking with **{{users}} users** with **{{commands}} commands!**

invite.clickHere: **Click here to invite me to your server**
invite.noteThat: Take note that you need the permission **$t(permissions:MANAGE_GUILD)** in order to invite me to your server.

support.clickHere: **[Click here to join my support server](https://discord.gg/tvN7cGJ)**

inversetext.noText: You need to give me a text to be inverted!

language.noArguments: You must type a valid language. `PT-BR || EN-US`
language.mustBe: You must type a valid language. `PT-BR || EN-US`
language.title: Language

prefix.missingPrefix: You need to give me a prefix to be changed!

blacklist.commandDescription: Adds a user to the blacklist.
blacklist.missingUser: You have to give me a user to blacklist!
blacklist.missingReason: You have to give me a reason for blacklisting!

unblacklist.commandDescription: Removes a user from the blacklist.
unblacklist.success: {{user}} has been removed from the blacklist!
unblacklist.missingUser: You have to give me a user to remove from the blacklist!

rep.commandDescription: Gives a reputation to an user
rep.repYourself: You cant give reputation to yourself!
rep.youCanGiveAgain: You need to wait `{{cooldown}}` before sending another reputation
rep.typeAgain: Oops... You need to type this command again :( The user that you just mentioned didn't had a database perfil :c

reps.commandDescription: See how much reputation an user has
reps.title: Reputation

hug.noMention: You need to inform the user to be hugged!
hug.title: Hug

kiss.noMention: You need to inform the user to be kissed!
kiss.title: Kiss

slap.noMention: You need to inform the user to be slapped!
slap.title: Slap

cowsay.noText: You need to give me a text!

logs.missingChannel: You need to give me a channel!
logs.title: Logs
logs.changedTo: The logs channel has been set to **#{{channel.name}}**
logs.author: Message author

leaderboard.commandDescription: Shows the top 5 users with most rep!
leaderboard.title: Leaderboard

money.commandDescription: Shows the money of an user.
money.title: Money

gems.commandDescription: Shows the gems of an user.
gems.title: Gems

mine.commandDescription: Work a little and get some gems!
mine.youCanMineAgain: You need to wait `{{cooldown}}` before mining again!
mine.mined: You found a total of `{{gems}}` today. Change it for money with the command `{{prefix}}commit <gems>`
